Package General

Class PentominoBuilder

java.lang.Object
General.PentominoBuilder
public class PentominoBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
Class responsible for building the pentomino pieces and exporting them to a CSV file

      public static int[][] rotate​(int[][] data, int rotation)

      Parameters:

      rotation - : amount of rotation
      Returns:
      the rotated matrix

    • makeBigger

      public static int[][] makeBigger​(int[][] data, int size)
      expands a smaller than size*size matrix to a size*size matrix it makes a copy, the input matrix stays unchanged assuming that the input is smaller than size!!
      Parameters:
      data - : the matrix
      size - : the square size of the new matrix
      Returns:
      the size*size matrix

      Parameters:

      data2 - : second matrix
      Returns:
